domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @AdamParkhomenko Unfortunately these people are like dogs: if you yell at a dog 10 minutes after it poops on the floor, it has no idea why you’re mad. When lots of these fools are sick with covid-19 in 14 days, they’ll be incapable of making the connection with their idiot rallies.
